      • isInRadius

        public boolean isInRadius(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Polygon polygon)
        Checks if a polygon is within the range of the ETFortress. Usually used to see if a firetruck is close enough to be attacked.
        Parameters:
        polygon - The polygon that needs to be checked.
        Returns:
        Whether the given polygon is in the radius of the ETFortress
